snippet.title: Dumbass Drivers! Trailer
snippet.description:
Dumbass Drivers! is a high octane, low budget arcade racing game by Screen 7 available on Steam!

Use skill and control to drive your way to retirement in over 16 races and 4 missions (plus 3 bonus jump scares) from May 4th!

Featuring music by Junkie Brush - http://junkiebrush.co.uk/

http://store.steampowered.com/app/597040
